channel.title: Help!
channel.description:
Ok I dont know if this this the right place, but I will try. I need help with adding an image to any graphic. Whenever I try it, it just opens the whole image, and doesn't add it to the graphic I had made. I dont know what to do. If anyone could help me that would be great.
Thanks For Any Help!

item.title: Help!
item.dc:creator: @solemage2 solemage2
item.description:
@solemage2 wrote:

I dont understand what you mean?

Read full topic

item.title: Help!
item.dc:creator: @Zoo_York_Skate Zoo York Skate
item.description:
@Zoo_York_Skate wrote:

It dosen’t. I have to copy and paste it in, but when I do this I have to blend it in, and most of the time, it just looks like crap.

Read full topic

item.title: Help!
item.dc:creator: @usernamelol .Fusion
item.description:
@usernamelol wrote:

[quote=“poor noob, post:5, topic:60331”]To add a render or image to the thing you are making, first open it up in photoshop then make sure you have your other graphic already open. now click and drag your render into your graphic.

Once it’s on your graphic you can resize it by hitting Ctrl + T then hold down Shift as you click and drag the corner boxes to make it the size you want.[/quote]

Read full topic
